alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 18 at 1:35PM PST until November 20 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 8 PM PST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 8 PM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains
